column1: It has been suggested that the spelling according to the Quenya style of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' would be ''lócë'', meaning "dragon, snake, serpent, drake".<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], ''Quettaparma Quenyallo'' (accessed 9 December 2010)</ref>
